## Product Overview

Bloks is an AI-powered relationship intelligence platform designed for relationship-driven professionals. It automatically captures, organizes, and analyzes information from calls, emails, documents, and web sources to create a comprehensive knowledge base for every client relationship.

**Core Capabilities:**
- Automated meeting transcription and note-taking
- AI-generated meeting summaries and follow-ups
- Self-organizing knowledge base (maps notes, transcripts, emails to people/companies)
- Relationship GPT (conversational AI search across all interactions)
- Pre-meeting briefings with context and history
- CRM-ready structured data
- Cross-platform support (Mac, Windows, iOS, Android)

**Target Users:**
- Financial advisors
- Investment professionals
- Consultants
- Coaches
- Sales teams
- Agency professionals

**Security & Compliance:**
- SOC2 Certified Infrastructure
- End-to-End Encryption (TLS 1.2+, AES-256)
- Data Residency Compliance (Canada, U.S., Europe)
- FINRA/SEC compliant (financial regulations in Canada and U.S.)
- Private data (never shared, never used for AI training)
